author: Adrian Collins
description:
When Michael R. Fletcher’s The Last Wardog was released in issue #37, I heard the morose howls of readers as they read this sad story of the dying war dog, The Darkest Shade of Grey, and his Packmaster, Ahira. On the losing side of a brutal siege, they try to protect their people in a final […]

The post Colin Mace brings Michael R. Fletcher’s morose The Last Wardog to life on YouTube appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: Colin Mace brings Michael R. Fletcher’s morose The Last Wardog to life on YouTube
